statements: SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT therapist_name, client_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments;
SELECT therapy_type, appointment_date, client_name FROM Appointments WHERE therapist_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT client_name, therapist_name FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, reminder_time FROM Appointments WHERE therapy_type = 'Massage' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE therapy_type = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT appointment_date, client_name FROM Appointments WHERE therapist_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, therapist_name FROM Appointments WHERE reminder_time < NOW() ORDER BY reminder_time;
SELECT therapist_name, COUNT(*) as total_appointments FROM Appointments GROUP BY therapist_name HAVING total_appointments > 5;
SELECT client_name, COUNT(*) as total_appointments FROM Appointments WHERE therapy_type = 'Massage Therapy' GROUP BY client_name HAVING total_appointments < 3;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions;
SELECT therapist_name, session_date FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT session_time, therapist_name FROM therapy_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT group_name, group_leader, meeting_date FROM support_groups WHERE meeting_time >= '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM support_groups ORDER BY meeting_date, meeting_time DESC;
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, session_date, session_time FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY session_date DESC, session_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT group_id, group_name, group_leader FROM support_groups WHERE meeting_time > '12:00:00' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC, group_id ASC;
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, session_date, session_time FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY session_time ASC, session_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_groups WHERE group_leader IN ('John', 'Emily', 'Sarah') ORDER BY group_name ASC, meeting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions;
SELECT therapist_name, client_name, appointment_time FROM therapy_sessions;
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, appointment_time, client_name FROM therapy_sessions;
SELECT * FROM support_groups;
SELECT facilitator_name, group_name, meeting_time FROM support_groups;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT client_name, appointment_time FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT therapist_name, client_name, appointment_time FROM therapy_sessions WHERE appointment_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, client_name, appointment_time FROM therapy_sessions ORDER BY appointment_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE related_table = 'therapy_sessions' AND reminder_time < NOW();
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions;
SELECT therapist_name, client_name, session_date FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM support_groups ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM support_groups WHERE group_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date >= '2022-09-15' AND reminder_date <= '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions;
SELECT therapist_name, client_name, session_date FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT group_name FROM support_groups;
SELECT reminder_text, reminder_date, reminder_time FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date > '2022-01-20';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM therapist;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_email FROM therapist WHERE therapist_id = 3;
SELECT therapist_name FROM therapist ORDER BY therapist_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE appointment_type = 'therapy' AND therapist_id = 2;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client WHERE client_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_email FROM therapist;
SELECT * FROM client WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_type, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointment WHERE therapist_id = 2;
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, client_id, session_date FROM therapy_session WHERE session_duration_minutes > 60;
SELECT group_name, group_location, group_schedule FROM support_group ORDER BY group_name DESC;
